body_html:
@srp1970 What version of TensorFlow are you using? This bug (i.e. lots of warnings) was fixed a few weeks ago IIRC, and the defaults for the optional args to generate_chrome_trace_format were also changed to remove a lot of the more detailed information (e.g. memory histograms and tensor snapshots).

Looks like the changes are in 0.9 here and here.

GPU tracing is only present with FULL_TRACE - there is no cheaper option which will give you the information you want. However this flag affects what is in the RunMetadata.StepStats protobuf you get back from session.run. The size of the chrome trace file is determined by which information from the StepStats you ask to visualize. e.g. adding full shape/size information on all intermediate tensors (show_memory=True) can make the JSON output much larger.
